sections.heading: Effective Date.Section 34.1-10-102 - Provision for Transition.Section 34.1-10-103 - Reserved.Section 34.1-10-104 - Repealed by Laws 2015, Ch. 124, 6.
sections.text:
34.1-10-101. Effective date.

This act shall become effective at midnight on January 1, 1962, and shall apply to transactions entered into and events occurring after that date.

sections.heading: Provision for Transition.
sections.text:
34.1-10-102. Provision for transition.

Transactions validly entered into before that date and the rights, duties and interests flowing from them remain valid thereafter and may be terminated, completed, consummated, or enforced as required or permitted by any statute or other law amended or repealed by this act as though such repeal or amendment had not occurred.
